etymology.description: 幺(幺) (yāo, "tiny threads") + 亠(亠) (tóu, "top mark") = two interwoven threads with a top mark representing a rope -> dark/mysterious
etymology.interpretation: The character combines tiny threads 幺(幺) with a distinguishing top mark 亠(亠), symbolizing complexity or intricacy akin to a rope. This imagery connects to its meaning of something dark or mysterious, possibly alluding to complexity not easily understood.

examples.chinese: 夜幕降临时(夜幕降臨時)，大地笼罩着玄秘的色彩(大地籠罩著玄秘的色彩)。
examples.pinyin: Yèmù jiànglín shí, dàdì lǒngzhào zhe xuánmì de sècǎi.
examples.english: When night falls, the earth is enveloped by mysterious, dark hues.

examples.chinese: 这幅山水画(這幅山水畫)充满玄妙意境(充滿玄妙意境)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè fú shānshuǐhuà chōngmǎn xuánmiào yìjìng.
examples.english: This landscape painting is full of mystical allure.

examples.chinese: 他的故事(他的故事)令人感到玄虚莫测(令人感到玄虛莫測)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de gùshì lìngrén gǎndào xuánxū mòcè.
examples.english: His story gives an impression of enigmatic inscrutability.
